name: AlphaRush
description:
HOW TO PLAY

- Tap a letter bubble when the letter on it is in your current word

- Tap yellow rewind bubbles to gain more time

- Tapping a bubble you already have gives you additional time

- Once you get a feel for the game, try beating your previous time on a word theme

FEATURES

- 20 word themes to try and beat

- Five unique backgrounds and music to enjoy
